DataElement.preferredName: Person Credential Neurologic Examination Institution Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator that asks whether the Neurocognitive Testing examiner has credentialing confirming completion of the neurocognitive testing training.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the credentials of a person that administers a neurocognitive examination (the assessment of the functionality of the brain through a cognitive examination).

Property.preferredDefinition: A document that qualifies somebody to do something, provides authentication for a claim, or confirms position or status.:The assessment of the functionality of the brain, spinal column, and nerves.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research as, a literary institution; also, a building or the buildings occupied or used by such organization.

Concepts.definition: Records that qualify somebody to do something, provides authentication for a claim, or confirms position or status.
The assessment of the functionality of the brain, spinal column, and nerves.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: The Neurocognitive Testing ex
ReferenceDocuments.description: The Neurocognitive Testing examiner must have credentialing confirming completion of the neurocognitive testing training

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is at least one individual at your site certified for Neurocognitive testing

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: The site study team member performing neurocognitive testing of patients must have credentialing confirming completion of the neurocognitive testing training.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CE7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Site has a Neurocognitive Testing Examiner with confirmed credentialing completion of the neurocognitive testing training
